summary: Uses astonishing visuals to tell the intersecting stories of George Mallory, the first man to attempt a summit of Mount Everest, and Conrad Anker, the mountaineer who finds Mallory's frozen remains 75 years later.
cast: Conrad Anker|Susan Robertson|Robert Macfarlane|Peter Gillman|Jennifer Lowe-Anker|Julie Summers|Leo Houlding|Liam Neeson|Ralph Fiennes|Hugh Dancy|Alan Rickman|Andrew Irvine|George Mallory|Natasha Richardson
title: The Wildest Dream
